@title SafeMath
@dev Math operations with safety checks that revert on error
attributes.name: SafeMath

attributes.documentation: @dev Multiplies two numbers, reverts on overflow.
attributes.name: mul

attributes.documentation: @dev Integer division of two numbers truncating the quotient, reverts on division by zero.
attributes.name: div

attributes.documentation: @dev Subtracts two numbers, reverts on overflow (i.e. if subtrahend is greater than minuend).
attributes.name: sub

attributes.documentation: @dev Adds two numbers, reverts on overflow.
attributes.name: add

attributes.documentation:
@dev Divides two numbers and returns the remainder (unsigned integer modulo),
reverts when dividing by zero.
attributes.name: mod

attributes.name: _transferOwnership

attributes.documentation:
@dev Ambix contract is used for morph Token set to another
Token's by rule (recipe). In distillation process given
Token's are burned and result generated by emission.
The recipe presented as equation in form:
(N1 * A1 & N'1 * A'1 & N''1 * A''1 ...)
| (N2 * A2 & N'2 * A'2 & N''2 * A''2 ...) ...
| (Nn * An & N'n * A'n & N''n * A''n ...)
= M1 * B1 & M2 * B2 ... & Mm * Bm 
where A, B - input and output tokens
N, M - token value coeficients
n, m - input / output dimetion size 
| - is alternative operator (logical OR)
& - is associative operator (logical AND)
This says that `Ambix` should receive (approve) left
part of equation and send (transfer) right part.
attributes.name: Ambix
appendSource
setSink

attributes.documentation:
@dev Run distillation process
@param _ix Source alternative index
attributes.name: run
